resources.string:
1. You need a Yeelight smart bulb. 
2. Install official Yeelight app. 
3. Add your bulb to Yeelight app. (follow app instructions) 
4. Enable developer mode for your bulb in Yeelight app. (Open app -> Select bulb -> Bulb settings -> LAN Control -> Enable) 
5. Connect to same wifi with bulb and you are ready to go!
1. Device is correctly powered;\n2. If developer options are not activated please install official application.
If device is not on the list, please make sure you activated developer options.
This application requires Wi-Fi to be enabled and connected. Do you want to enable it?
Yeelight API quota exceeded and reseted. Try your action again!
Device is offline, please check the following

1. Check if your device is powered
 2. Check if Wifi is available 
 3. If the device changed it's IP address, click the refresh button 
 4. Remove your device from this application and reconnect it
